bibl.title: The Late Antique World of Early Islam: Muslims among Christians and Jews in the East Mediterranean

series.title: Studies in Late Antiquity and Early Islam

bibl.note: This volume constitutes the proceedings of a workshop held at Oxford in 2012, the second in a series of such events on the history of the early medieval Mediterranean world convened by the universities of Leiden, Oxford, Paris and Princeton. - 15 contributions. - Pp. 1-6: R.H.H., Introduction. - I. Social Groups. - II. Law. - III. Material Culture. - IV. Theology and Practice. - Index.
bibl.seg: Robert G. Hoyland (ed.), The Late Antique World of Early Islam: Muslims among Christians and Jews in the East Mediterranean = Studies in Late Antiquity and Early Islam. 25.
Princeton, Darwin Press, 2015, 8Â°, x-469 pp., 3 graphiques, figg., 4 cartes. ISBN 978-0-87850-210-3. $49.95.

This volume constitutes the proceedings of a workshop held at Oxford in 2012, the second in a series of such events on the history of the early medieval Mediterranean world convened by the universities of Leiden, Oxford, Paris and Princeton. - 15 contributions. - Pp. 1-6: R.H.H., Introduction. - I.
